Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110225 Firefox/4.0b13pre

1. Load http://www.grantgalitz.org/SuperMarioBros/.
2. Close the localstorage info bar by clicking the 'X' on the right side.
3. Press arrow keys or X.

Result: nothing happens
